author: AP
title: Bundesliga future still in the air amid virus outbreak
description: There is optimism among some that the Bundesliga will be able to resume in May with soccer teams resuming training in small groups this week
content:
BERLIN (AP) — With soccer teams in Germany resuming training in small groups this week, there is optimism among some that the Bundesliga will be able to resume in May.
Such hopes appear slim, however, with the coronavirus outbreak still not under control.
